mapper.update:
update price_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price_code = #{record.priceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_price = #{record.timePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
time_interval = #{record.timeInterval,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
time_unit = #{record.timeUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
water_price = #{record.waterPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
water_interval = #{record.waterInterval,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
water_unit = #{record.waterUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enabled = #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update price_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_code = #{record.priceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_price = #{record.timePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, time_interval = #{record.timeInterval,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time_unit = #{record.timeUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, water_price = #{record.waterPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, water_interval = #{record.waterInterval,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, water_unit = #{record.waterUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled = #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update price_info
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price_code = #{priceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_price = #{timePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
time_interval = #{timeInterval,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
time_unit = #{timeUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
water_price = #{waterPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
water_interval = #{waterInterval,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
water_unit = #{waterUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
